casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Franchot Lane CHRISTMAS 252P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Franchot Lane Christmas, for Christmas, Franchot Lane. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Womble, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of August 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
